text.section: A person authorized to conduct bingo under subsection (b) of this section shall obtain a bingo permit from the county agency designated by the County Commissioners to issue a bingo permit.
A person who is not a legal resident of the county may not conduct bingo.
To qualify for a bingo permit, a person shall meet the requirements set by the county.
Only members of an organization listed under subsection (b) of this section may conduct and operate bingo games.
